item.title: [Python] Convert Tamiya's fun work series to Donkey Car
item.description: > AI RC Car Advent Calendar 2019 Participating article. Let’s make a Donkey car using Tamiya work series I made an AI autonomous car Donkey Car based on Tamiya’s work series “Bulldozer”. I actually ran the orbital course at the driving session using the next learning model. The source code used this time and how to make it are written in detail on GitHub side, so this article will introduce the outline and modification points.
